name: Kanji Master
description:
A simple tool for learning Kanji with a simple quiz minigame to test your knowledge.

Features
- JLPT N5(80 kanji)
- JLPT N4(167 kanji)
- JLPT N3(370 kanji)
- JLPT N2(368 kanji)
- JLPT N1(1235 kanji)
- Details about the selected kanji
- Basic list sorting
- Random background image
- 1 Minigame, with simple scoring system
